actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1970 to provide that Federal agencies keep congressional committees fully and currently informed.

summary.text: Requires every Federal agency to keep each standing committee of the State and the House of Representatives fully and currently informed with respect to all matters relating to that agency which are within the jurisdiction of such committee. Provides that every a Federal agency shall furnish any information requested by any such standing committee with respect to the activities or responsibilities of that agency within the jurisdiction of that committee.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1970 to provide that Federal agencies keep congressional committees fully and currently informed.
